description: Structural detail sheet with 8 numbered details including shearwall schedule, holdown/column schedule, slab edge detail, footing sections at holdowns, stud wall/shear wall sections, and anchor bolt connection details.
key_content: Shearwall schedule: Mark 1 = 15/32 STR CD, 8d nails, 6" edge / 12" field, 340 PLF
Shearwall schedule: Mark 2 = 15/32 STR CD, 8d nails, 4" edge / 12" field, 510 PLF
Special inspection required for nailing at 4" O.C. or less
Holdown schedule: Mark 1 = HD12, 6-SD25212 anchor, 4x4 post, 3,075 lbs uplift
Footing sections at holdowns (Details 6 and 7) with anchor bolt embedment
Stud wall / shear wall cross-section (Detail 2) showing exterior wall assembly
Anchor bolt / sill bolt connection detail (Detail 3)
Holdown notes: minimum 4x4 posts, fully blocked at panel connections, minimum 3x blocking
Galvanized sheathing nails for exterior, common wire nails for interior
NOT SHOWN: roof-to-wall connection details (may be on S3)
NOT SHOWN: uplift values for marks beyond Mark 1 in holdown schedule (partially obscured)

drawing_zones.content: Footing sections — DC footing and 2E footing with anchor bolts
Shearwall Schedule table with Marks 1-2 and shearwall notes
Holdown/Column Schedule table and holdown notes 1-7
Holdown anchor in concrete footing cross-section
Stud wall / shear wall section with exterior assembly
Typical section of footing at holdown — full detail
Anchor bolt / sill bolt connection detail
